title: Adobo Black Bean Tostadas With Shredded Lettuce, Lime Cashew Crema, Avocado & Salsa Macha

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Rinse baby gem lettuce, lime, and avocado.

steps.raw_text: Take out a saucepan
steps.label: Take out saucepan
steps.notes: Prepare saucepan for black beans.

steps.raw_text: preheat your oven to 200°C / 180°C fan.
steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 200°C conventional or 180°C fan. Inferred duration for preheating.

steps.raw_text: pop thetacosonto a baking tray with space in between them and bake for 8 minutes or until crispy, flipping half way.
steps.label: Bake tostadas until crispy
steps.notes: Flip halfway through baking. Bake until crispy.

steps.raw_text: Drain theblackbeans
steps.label: Drain black beans
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: empty into your saucepan along with thesmoky adobo sauce, place over a medium heat and warm through, stirring occasionally, until piping hot, around 5 minutes. Add a splash of water if it starts to stick at the bottom.
steps.label: Warm black beans with adobo sauce
steps.notes: Place over medium heat. Stir occasionally. Add a splash of water if it starts to stick. Warm until piping hot.

steps.raw_text: Roughly mash around half of the beans with a fork and set aside.
steps.label: Mash half of the black beans
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Finely shred thebabygemby cutting horizontally across the head.
steps.label: Shred baby gem lettuce
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: De-stone theavocadoand cut into thin slices flat side down. If you're feeling fancy you could fan the avocado for a more elevated final presentation. Using the palm of your hand, carefully push the avocado down and away from yourself to open it up like a fan without the slices breaking.
steps.label: Slice avocado
steps.notes: Optional: fan the avocado for presentation. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Cut thelimeinto wedges.
steps.label: Cut lime into wedges
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Start with a layer ofblackbeans, then shreddedlettuce, dress the lettuce with a drizzle ofcashewcrema, top with some slices ofavocadoand a final drizzle ofsalsamacha.
steps.label: Assemble tostadas
steps.notes: Layer black beans, shredded lettuce, cashew crema, avocado, and salsa macha.

steps.raw_text: Finish with a squeeze of freshlimejuice, and enjoy!
steps.label: Garnish with lime juice
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

title: Afghan Aubergine (Borani Banjan) With Saucy Spiced Lentils, Garlic Yoghurt, Fresh Mint & Pillowy Flatbreads

steps.raw_text: Crispy roasted aubergine
steps.label: Preheat oven for aubergine
steps.notes: Temperature and duration inferred for roasting. Start early to allow overlap with other steps.

steps.raw_text: Crispy roasted aubergine
steps.label: Slice aubergine for roasting
steps.notes: Duration inferred for efficient prep.

steps.raw_text: Crispy roasted aubergine sit over a rich tomato sauce
steps.label: Roast aubergine until crispy
steps.notes: Duration inferred for roasting. Ensure aubergine is thinly sliced for quicker cooking.

steps.raw_text: rich tomato sauce infused with garlic and spices
steps.label: Chop onion and garlic for sauce
steps.notes: Duration inferred for efficient prep.

steps.raw_text: rich tomato sauce infused with garlic and spices
steps.label: Sauté onion, garlic, and spices
steps.notes: Duration inferred. Spices include paprika, cumin, coriander, fennel, chilli, cinnamon, allspice from ingredients.

steps.raw_text: we've added lentils to the sauce for extra protein, iron and fibre
steps.label: Add lentils, tomato, and liquids
steps.notes: Duration inferred. Includes ingredients like balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, agave nectar, tomato puree, sea salt from the ingredient list.

steps.raw_text: rich tomato sauce infused with garlic and spices. Although not traditional, we've added lentils to the sauce
steps.label: Simmer lentil sauce until thick
steps.notes: Duration inferred for simmering. Assumes quick-cooking lentils or pre-cooked lentils.

steps.raw_text: It's all finished with garlic yoghurt
steps.label: Prepare garlic soy yoghurt
steps.notes: Duration inferred. Uses 'organic cultured soy yoghurt' and 'garlic' from ingredients.

steps.raw_text: fresh mint
steps.label: Chop fresh mint
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: served with our pillowy soft garlic and herb flatbreads
steps.label: Warm garlic and herb flatbreads
steps.notes: Duration inferred. Can be warmed in the oven during the last few minutes of aubergine/sauce cooking, or in a pan.

steps.raw_text: Crispy roasted aubergine sit over a rich tomato sauce... It's all finished with garlic yoghurt, fresh mint and served with our pillowy soft garlic and herb flatbreads
steps.label: Assemble and serve Borani Banjan
steps.notes: Layer roasted aubergine over sauce, top with yoghurt and mint, serve with flatbreads.

title: Sticky Aubergine Sambal Over Tamarind Whipped Tofu With Crispy Lentils, Toasted Peanuts & Coriander
Aromatic Thai Green Curry Soup With Beluga Lentils, Tender Aubergine, Sweet Potato, Basil & Lime

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Duration inferred for general rinsing of ingredients like lentils, basil, sweet potato, and aubergine.

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 220°C / 200°C fan and take out a large roasting tray, and a large saucepan.
steps.label: Preheat oven and get equipment
steps.notes: Oven temperature is 220°C (200°C fan). Duration inferred for oven preheating.

steps.raw_text: Dice thesweet potatoandaubergineinto 1.5cm cubes.
steps.label: Dice sweet potato and aubergine
steps.notes: Duration inferred for dicing two vegetables.

steps.raw_text: Add the sweet potato to one side of your roasting tray and the aubergine to the other. Drizzle generously with olive oil, season with salt and pepper
steps.label: Add vegetables to tray and season

steps.raw_text: roast until tender, around 20-30 minutes.
steps.label: Roast sweet potato and aubergine
steps.notes: Duration is the midpoint of the 20-30 minute range. Roast until tender.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile drain and rinse the lentils well.
steps.label: Drain and rinse lentils
steps.notes: Duration inferred. 'Meanwhile' indicates this can be done in parallel with roasting.

steps.raw_text: Roll up thebasilleaves with your hands and finely slice them.
steps.label: Roll and slice basil leaves
steps.notes: Duration inferred. 'Meanwhile' indicates this can be done in parallel with roasting.

steps.raw_text: Set aside a quarter of the basil leaves for a garnish.
steps.label: Set aside basil for garnish

steps.raw_text: Once there's 5 minutes left on the vegetables, add thegreen curry soupto your saucepan.
steps.label: Add green curry soup to saucepan
steps.notes: This step should begin when 'step-5' (roasting vegetables) has approximately 5 minutes remaining.

steps.raw_text: Bring to a gentle simmer and cook for a further 2-3 minutes or until piping hot.
steps.label: Simmer green curry soup until hot
steps.notes: Duration is the midpoint of the 2-3 minute range. Cook until piping hot. This step can overlap with the end of roasting.

steps.raw_text: Add the drainedlentilsand the remaining three quarters ofbasilto the soup
steps.label: Add lentils and basil to soup

steps.raw_text: and cook for a further 2 minutes.
steps.label: Cook soup with lentils and basil

steps.raw_text: Remove from the heat
steps.label: Remove soup from heat

steps.raw_text: squeeze in half of the lime
steps.label: Squeeze lime into soup

steps.raw_text: and season to taste with salt.
steps.label: Season soup to taste

steps.raw_text: To serve, divide thethai green curry soupandlentilsbetween serving bowls
steps.label: Divide soup and lentils into bowls

steps.raw_text: arrange thesweetpotatoandauberginearound the bowl
steps.label: Arrange roasted vegetables around bowls

steps.raw_text: and garnish with the remainingbasilleaves.
steps.label: Garnish with remaining basil leaves

steps.raw_text: Squeeze over the remaininglimeand enjoy!
steps.label: Squeeze remaining lime over bowls

title: Butternut Squash Brothy Beans With Crispy Sprouts & Sage, Hot Agave 'Nduja' Dressing, Toasted Pine Nuts & Pumpkin Seeds

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above) and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Gather and rinse ingredients
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 220°C / 200°C fan
steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 220°C / 200°C fan. Inferred duration for preheating.

steps.raw_text: take out a large saucepan, a frying pan and a baking tray.
steps.label: Take out cooking equipment
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Trim the bottoms of thebrusselssproutsif needed, then slice them thinly with a sharp knife. Alternatively you can cut them in half but thinly slicing will make them crispier and quicker to cook.
steps.label: Trim and slice brussels sprouts
steps.notes: Thinly slicing preferred for crispiness and quicker cooking. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Place the sprouts onto your baking tray, toss in a little olive oil and season well with salt and pepper.
steps.label: Season sprouts on baking tray
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Roast in the oven until brown and crisp, around 15-20 minutes, turning/tossing halfway.
steps.label: Roast sprouts until crisp
steps.notes: Roast until brown and crisp, around 15-20 minutes. Turn/toss halfway. Average duration 18 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Drain thebutterbeansand add to your saucepan along with thesquash broth.
steps.label: Combine butterbeans and squash broth
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Once there is 5 minutes left of cooking time on the sprouts, place the pan over a medium-high heat.
steps.label: Heat butterbeans and broth
steps.notes: Place pan over medium-high heat when 5 minutes of sprout roasting remain. Inferred duration until bubbling.

steps.raw_text: Once the sauce is bubbling, reduce to low-medium and cook for 2-3 minutes or until piping hot.
steps.label: Simmer beans until piping hot
steps.notes: Once bubbling, reduce to low-medium and cook for 2-3 minutes or until piping hot. Duration 2-3 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Place your frying pan over a low-medium heat, then dry fry (without oil) thepumpkin and pine nutsuntil lightly toasted.
steps.label: Dry fry pumpkin and pine nuts
steps.notes: Dry fry without oil until lightly toasted. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Remove from the pan and set aside.
steps.label: Remove toasted nuts and set aside
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Add a few tablespoons of olive oil to the pan and place it back over a medium heat.
steps.label: Heat oil in frying pan
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: When hot, add thesageleaves without overlapping. The leaves will turn translucent and the oil will stop bubbling around the leaves when they are crisp. Remove and set aside.
steps.label: Crisp sage leaves in oil
steps.notes: Add sage leaves without overlapping. Cook until leaves turn translucent and oil stops bubbling, indicating crispness. Remove and set aside. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: To serve up, divide thebutternut squash brothy beansbetween serving bowls and top with the crispy shreddedsprouts, toastedpumpkin and pine nuts, crispysageand finish with a drizzle ofhot agave nduja. Enjoy!
steps.label: Assemble and garnish bowls
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

title: Creamy Tomato Daal With Charred Cauliflower, Crispy Kale, Coconut Yoghurt & Fluffy Rice

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw grains, herbs, vegetables
steps.notes: Inferred duration for general rinsing.

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 200°C / 220°C fan
steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Oven temperature is 200°C (or 220°C fan). Inferred duration for preheating.

steps.raw_text: take out a large roasting tray and two saucepans.
steps.label: Take out roasting tray and saucepans
steps.notes: Two saucepans are mentioned, one for daal and one for rice. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Cut the cauliflower into bitesized chunks
steps.label: Cut cauliflower into bitesized chunks
steps.notes: Inferred duration for chopping cauliflower.

steps.raw_text: place into your roasting tray and toss with olive oil, salt and pepper.
steps.label: Toss cauliflower with olive oil, salt, pepper
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender in the centre and nicely charred on the outside.
steps.label: Roast cauliflower until tender and charred
steps.notes: Duration range 15-20 minutes, midpoint 17.5 rounded to 18 minutes. Cook until tender in the centre and nicely charred on the outside.

steps.raw_text: Empty the tomato daal sauce into your saucepan along with the red lentils and 250ml of water.
steps.label: Combine daal sauce, lentils, water
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Cook the daal over a medium heat for around until the lentils are tender and cooked through, around 10-15 minutes. Stir regularly to stop the lentils from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
steps.label: Cook daal until lentils are tender
steps.notes: Cook over a medium heat. Duration range 10-15 minutes, midpoint 12.5 rounded to 13 minutes. Stir regularly to prevent sticking.

steps.raw_text: Once cooked, squeeze in half of the lime and season to taste with salt.
steps.label: Season daal with lime and salt
steps.notes: Squeeze in half of the lime and season to taste. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Place the rice in a small saucepan and cover with 2.5x its volume in water.
steps.label: Combine rice and water in saucepan
steps.notes: Cover with 2.5x its volume in water. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and cover. Cook for 8-10 minutes or until the rice is tender, but al dente.
steps.label: Cook rice until tender but al dente
steps.notes: Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and cover. Duration range 8-10 minutes, midpoint 9 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Remove any hardy stems from the cavolo nero, then finely slice the leaves.
steps.label: Prep and slice cavolo nero leaves
steps.notes: Remove any hardy stems, then finely slice the leaves. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile roughly chop the coriander leaves.
steps.label: Chop coriander leaves
steps.notes: Explicitly 'Meanwhile'. Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Once there is 10 minutes left on the roasted cauliflower, add the sliced cavolo nero to one side of the roasting tray, toss in a little olive oil and some salt and roast for the final 10 minutes of cooking time. Check the cavolo nero after 5 minutes to make sure it doesn't burn.
steps.label: Roast cavolo nero
steps.notes: Add to roasting tray with 10 minutes left on cauliflower roasting time. Toss with olive oil and salt. Check after 5 minutes to prevent burning. Uses the same oven and temperature as cauliflower.

steps.raw_text: Divide the tomato daal and rice between serving bowls
steps.label: Divide daal and rice into bowls
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: then top with the charred cauliflower, crispy cavolo nero and a dollop of coconut yoghurt. Garnish with chopped coriander, the rest of the lime juice and enjoy!
steps.label: Top and garnish bowls
steps.notes: Top with charred cauliflower, crispy cavolo nero, coconut yoghurt. Garnish with chopped coriander and lime juice. Inferred duration.

title: High Protein Lebanese Tofu Nourish Bowl With Quinoa Tabbouleh, Green Tahini Sauce & Pink Pickled Onion

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw grains, herbs, vegetables
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Boil your kettle
steps.label: Boil kettle
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: take out a large frying pan and a saucepan.
steps.label: Take out frying pan and saucepan
steps.notes: Instruction from method text. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Fill your saucepan with boiling water from your kettle and place over a medium heat to bring to the boil.
steps.label: Fill saucepan, heat to boil
steps.notes: Place over medium heat to bring to the boil. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Cook the quinoa in your saucepan with boiling water until al dente, around 8 minutes.
steps.label: Cook quinoa until al dente
steps.notes: Cook until al dente, around 8 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Drain and put it aside on a sieve over the saucepan to make sure it's drained very well while you prepare the rest of the dish.
steps.label: Drain quinoa thoroughly
steps.notes: Make sure it's drained very well while preparing the rest of the dish. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Cut the tofu into two blocks, lengthwise. Use a peeler or the slicer on a cheese grater to peel each block into thick ribbons (or slice very thinly with a sharp knife).
steps.label: Cut tofu into thick ribbons
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Place the tofu into a container or bowl. Mix 2 tbsp of extra virgin olive oil with the tofu spice mix and stir to combine. Pour this over the tofu and gently toss to make sure it's all evenly covered.
steps.label: Mix and toss tofu with spices
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Heat your large frying pan on medium heat
steps.label: Heat frying pan to medium
steps.notes: Heat on medium heat. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: fry the tofu for 4-6 mins until starting to brown on the edges. Take care not to overcook it as it could become too crispy - the slices should still be soft in the middle.
steps.label: Fry tofu until edges brown
steps.notes: Fry for 4-6 minutes (midpoint 5 min). Do not overcook; slices should still be soft in the middle.

steps.raw_text: Taste and season with more salt and pepper if you like.
steps.label: Taste and season fried tofu
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Finely chop the parsley, cut the cherry tomatoes and thinly slice the cucumber.
steps.label: Chop parsley, tomatoes, cucumber
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add them to a mixing bowl with the quinoa. Add a generous drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.season well with salt and pepper and give everything a good mix.
steps.label: Mix salad with oil, salt, pepper
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Spoon the salad into bowls
steps.label: Spoon salad into bowls
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and top with the tofu.
steps.label: Top salad with fried tofu
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Pour over theherby tahini yoghurt
steps.label: Pour herby tahini yoghurt
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and top with thepinkpickledonions.
steps.label: Top with pink pickled onions
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

title: Healing Turmeric, Lemon & Ginger Chickpea Stew With Cavolo Nero, Coconut Yoghurt & Chilli Garlic Crunch
Gut-Friendly Lemon & Chickpea Broth With Crispy Parsnip & Sweet Potato, Cavolo Nero & Salsa Verde

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above) and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Gather ingredients and rinse produce
steps.notes: Take out all ingredients and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 200°C / 220°C fan
steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Use 220°C for fan oven. Note: The total estimated time for the recipe (20 minutes) may be challenging to achieve given this preheat time and subsequent cooking durations.

steps.raw_text: then take out a large roasting tray, a steamer and a saucepan.
steps.label: Gather cooking equipment
steps.notes: Take out a large roasting tray, a steamer and a saucepan.

steps.raw_text: Cut the top and tail off theparsnipandsweetpotato, then dice into small 1cm cubes.
steps.label: Cut parsnip and sweet potato
steps.notes: Inferred duration, adjusted for 'Prep time 4'. Dice into small 1cm cubes.

steps.raw_text: Place into your roasting tray, toss in a drizzle of olive oil and season well with salt and pepper.
steps.label: Season parsnip and sweet potato
steps.notes: Inferred duration, adjusted for 'Prep time 4'. Toss in a drizzle of olive oil and season well with salt and pepper.

steps.raw_text: Roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender and crispy.
steps.label: Roast parsnip and sweet potato
steps.notes: Roast for 15-20 minutes or until tender and crispy. Duration range: 15-20 minutes.

steps.raw_text: Remove any hardy stems from thecavolonero, then roughly chop the leaves into bite-sized pieces.
steps.label: Prepare cavolo nero
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Remove hardy stems, then roughly chop the leaves into bite-sized pieces.

steps.raw_text: Steam for for 5-10 minutes or until tender. If you don't have a steamer you can boil for the same time.
steps.label: Steam cavolo nero
steps.notes: Steam until tender. Duration range: 5-10 minutes. If you don't have a steamer you can boil for the same time.

steps.raw_text: Drain thechickpeas, then empty into your large saucepan along with thelemon brothand 300ml of water.
steps.label: Combine chickpeas and broth
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Drain chickpeas, then empty into saucepan along with lemon broth and 300ml of water.

steps.raw_text: Place over a medium high heat, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and continue to cook for 2-3 minutes or until the stew is piping hot and beans are cooked through. You can continue to reduce the broth for longer if you prefer a stronger flavour.
steps.label: Cook chickpea stew
steps.notes: Place over a medium high heat, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and continue to cook until piping hot and beans are cooked through. Duration range: 2-3 minutes for simmering. You can continue to reduce the broth for longer if you prefer a stronger flavour.

steps.raw_text: To serve up, divide the stew between serving bowls
steps.label: Divide stew into bowls
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: top with thecavoloneroandroastedsweetpotatoandparsnips. Drizzle generously with the tangy capersalsaverde, and enjoy!
steps.label: Garnish and serve
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Top with cavolo nero and roasted sweet potato and parsnips. Drizzle generously with salsa verde.

title: Oyster Mushroom Bulgogi Bowl With Sticky Sushi Rice, Kimchi, Cucumber Salad & Toasted Sesame Seeds

steps.raw_text: take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above)
steps.label: Gather all ingredients
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Ensure all ingredients are ready.

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw ingredients
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Rinse sushi rice, cucumber, etc.

steps.raw_text: take out a saucepan and a mixing bowl. We highly recommend using a cast iron pan or griddle to char the oyster mushrooms if you have one. If you don't a frying pan will work too.
steps.label: Gather cooking equipment
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Equipment recommendation for charring mushrooms.

steps.raw_text: Boil your kettle for cooking the sushi rice.
steps.label: Boil kettle water
steps.notes: Inferred duration. For cooking sushi rice.

steps.raw_text: Place thesushi ricein a small saucepan and pour over 2.5x its volume in water from your kettle.
steps.label: Add sushi rice and water
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Use 2.5x volume of water.

steps.raw_text: Bring to the boil and once it's bubbling
steps.label: Bring sushi rice to boil
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Cook until bubbling.

steps.raw_text: reduce the heat to low, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until tender but al dente.
steps.label: Simmer sushi rice
steps.notes: Midpoint of 8-10 minutes. Cook until tender but al dente. Reduce heat to low and cover.

steps.raw_text: Dice thebaby cucumberinto bite-sized chunks
steps.label: Dice baby cucumber
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Dice into bite-sized chunks.

steps.raw_text: roughly chop thekimchi.
steps.label: Roughly chop kimchi
steps.notes: Inferred duration.

steps.raw_text: Tear theoyster mushroomsinto 1.5-2cm strips
steps.label: Tear oyster mushrooms into strips
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Tear into 1.5-2cm strips.

steps.raw_text: add them to your mixing bowl along with 1/3rd of thebulgogi sauceand a good amount of salt and pepper. Give everything a good mix with your hands until the mushrooms are well coated in marinade.
steps.label: Marinate oyster mushrooms
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Add 1/3rd bulgogi sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix until well coated.

steps.raw_text: Thread the marinated oyster mushroom pieces onto thewooden skewers
steps.label: Thread mushrooms onto skewers
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Thread marinated oyster mushroom pieces.

steps.raw_text: Place your cast iron griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat and add a generous drizzle of olive oil. Once the pan is searing hot
steps.label: Preheat pan with oil
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Place over medium-high heat, add olive oil. Heat until searing hot.

steps.raw_text: add the mushroom skewers. We recommend compressing the oyster mushrooms with a spatula or slotted turner so that they flatten and get crispier. Cook until crispy and blackened a little, around 5 minutes on each side.  Brush the mushrooms with a littlebulgogi sauceas you cook.
steps.label: Cook mushroom skewers (side 1)
steps.notes: Cook for around 5 minutes. Compress mushrooms with spatula/turner. Brush with bulgogi sauce during cooking. Remember to save half of the remaining bulgogi sauce for serving as a dressing.

steps.raw_text: around 5 minutes on each side.  Brush the mushrooms with a littlebulgogi sauceas you cook.
steps.label: Cook mushroom skewers (side 2)
steps.notes: Cook for around 5 minutes. Brush with bulgogi sauce during cooking.

steps.raw_text: divide the cookedsushi ricebetween serving bowls
steps.label: Divide cooked sushi rice
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Divide between serving bowls.

steps.raw_text: top withbulgogi oyster mushroom skewers,kimchi, andbaby cucumber.
steps.label: Top bowls with main components
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Top with bulgogi oyster mushroom skewers, kimchi, and baby cucumber.

steps.raw_text: Finish with a sprinkle ofsesame garnish
steps.label: Garnish with sesame seeds
steps.notes: Inferred duration. Sprinkle of sesame garnish.

steps.raw_text: and a drizzle of the remaining bulgogi sauce.

title: Rich & Creamy Tofu Butter 'Chicken' With Baby Spinach, Garlic Naan & Toasted Almond Flakes

steps.raw_text: take out all the ingredients for this recipe
steps.label: Take out all ingredients
steps.notes: General mise en place. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Rinse raw grains, herbs, vegetables
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Pre-heat your oven to 220°C / 200°C fan
steps.label: Pre-heat oven
steps.notes: Oven temperature is 220°C / 200°C fan. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: then take out a baking tray and deep frying pan or wok.
steps.label: Take out baking tray and pan
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Tear thetofuinto bite-sized chunks
steps.label: Tear tofu into bite-sized chunks
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: place into your roasting tray
steps.label: Place tofu in roasting tray
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: toss through a drizzle of olive oil and season generously with salt and pepper.
steps.label: Toss tofu with oil, salt, pepper
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Roast for 20 minutes, turning halfway.
steps.label: Roast tofu, turning halfway
steps.notes: Roast for 20 minutes, turning halfway. Tofu should be starting to turn brown and crispy on the outside.

steps.raw_text: Place your frying pan or wok over a medium heat and dry fry (without oil) theflakedalmondsto toast.
steps.label: Dry fry flaked almonds
steps.notes: Cook over medium heat without oil. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Remove and set aside.
steps.label: Remove and set aside almonds
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Wipe the pan clean as you'll use it again shortly.
steps.label: Wipe frying pan clean
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Once the tofu has 3 minutes left of cooking time, add thebutter 'chicken' sauceto your frying pan
steps.label: Add butter 'chicken' sauce to pan
steps.notes: This step starts when the tofu has 3 minutes left of cooking time. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: place over a medium heat. Add thebabyspinach, stir it through the sauce and cook until wilted.

steps.notes: Cook over medium heat until spinach is wilted. This step runs concurrently with the last 3 minutes of tofu roasting.

steps.raw_text: Remove the tofu from the oven
steps.label: Remove tofu from oven
steps.notes: This happens at the end of the 20 minute tofu roasting. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: at the same time, place thegarlic and herb naaninto the oven to warm through.
steps.label: Warm garlic and herb naan in oven
steps.notes: Place naan into the oven at the same time as removing tofu. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add thetofuto the curry sauce pan
steps.label: Add tofu to curry sauce
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: stir well to combine.
steps.label: Stir tofu and sauce to combine
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add a generous knob of vegan butter if you have some and stir through (optional).
steps.label: Add optional vegan butter
steps.notes: Optional step. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Season to taste with salt and pepper.

steps.notes: Season with salt and pepper. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: divide thetofu butter 'chicken'curry between serving bowls
steps.label: Divide tofu butter 'chicken' curry
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: drizzle over theyoghurt
steps.label: Drizzle yoghurt over curry
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: finish with a scattering of toastedalmonds.

steps.notes: Duration inferred.

title: Super Green Udon Noodles With Tenderstem Broccoli, Crispy Sesame Crusted Tofu & Rayu Chilli Drizzle

steps.raw_text: Before you start, take out all the ingredients for this recipe (see picture above) and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables.
steps.label: Take out and rinse ingredients
steps.notes: Duration inferred. This step is described as 'Before you start'.

steps.raw_text: Boil your kettle
steps.label: Boil kettle
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: then take out a sauce pan and a large frying pan.
steps.label: Take out saucepan and frying pan
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Fill your saucepan with boiling water from your kettle
steps.label: Fill saucepan with boiling water
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: place over a high heat and bring to the boil for the noodles.
steps.label: Bring saucepan water to boil
steps.notes: Place over high heat. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add theudon noodlesto your saucepan of boiling water and cook for 5–6 minutes, or until tender but still al dente.
steps.label: Cook udon noodles
steps.notes: Cook for 5–6 minutes, or until tender but still al dente.

steps.raw_text: Once cooked, drain and rinse the noodles under cold water - this helps remove excess starch and prevents them from becoming soggy.
steps.label: Drain and rinse noodles
steps.notes: Rinse under cold water to remove excess starch and prevent sogginess. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Set them aside in a colander to drain.
steps.label: Set aside noodles to drain
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add thesuper green noodle sauceandbaby spinachto a blender, and blend until smooth and vibrant green. Alternatively, use a hand blender in a bowl, or finely chop the baby spinach and fold it into the sauce.
steps.label: Blend noodle sauce and spinach
steps.notes: Blend until smooth and vibrant green. Alternative: hand blender in a bowl, or finely chop spinach and fold in. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Cut thetenderstem broccoliinto bite-sized pieces
steps.label: Cut tenderstem broccoli
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and dice thetofuinto 1.5 cm cubes.
steps.label: Dice tofu cubes
steps.notes: Dice into 1.5 cm cubes. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Take out two bowls and combine thecornflourwith a little water in one of them, to make a thin batter.
steps.label: Make cornflour batter
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Empty the sesame seeds into a separate bowl.
steps.label: Prepare sesame seeds
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Dredge the tofu cubes in the batter so they are wet, then toss them in the sesame seeds until coated.
steps.label: Coat tofu with batter and sesame
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Place your frying pan over medium-high heat and add a drizzle of oil. Once hot,
steps.label: Heat frying pan for broccoli
steps.notes: Place over medium-high heat with a drizzle of oil. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: add thetenderstem broccoliand fry for 4-5 minutes, until slightly charred and tender but still with a bit of bite.
steps.label: Fry tenderstem broccoli
steps.notes: Fry for 4-5 minutes, until slightly charred and tender but still with a bit of bite.

steps.raw_text: Transfer to a plate and set aside.
steps.label: Transfer broccoli to plate
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: In the same pan, add another drizzle of oil
steps.label: Heat frying pan for tofu
steps.notes: Add another drizzle of oil to the same pan. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and fry thesesame coated tofu cubesfor 6-8 minutes, turning occasionally, until all sides are golden and crispy.
steps.label: Fry sesame coated tofu
steps.notes: Fry for 6-8 minutes, turning occasionally, until all sides are golden and crispy.

steps.raw_text: Remove from the pan and set aside on a plate.
steps.label: Remove tofu to plate
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Wipe the frying pan clean and place it back over medium heat.
steps.label: Wipe frying pan clean
steps.notes: Place pan back over medium heat. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Add thesuper green sauceto the pan and warm gently. Once the sauce is piping hot,
steps.label: Warm super green sauce
steps.notes: Warm gently over medium heat until piping hot. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: add the cookedudon noodlesandtenderstem broccoli, then stir until well combined and heated through.
steps.label: Combine noodles, broccoli, sauce
steps.notes: Stir until well combined and heated through. Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: To serve, divide thesuper green udon noodlesbetween serving bowls
steps.label: Divide noodles into bowls
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: and top with thecrispy sesame crusted tofu.
steps.label: Top with crispy tofu
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

steps.raw_text: Drizzle withsmoky black bean rayu, and enjoy!
steps.label: Drizzle with rayu
steps.notes: Duration inferred.

title: Super Green Cheats Lasagne With Courgette, Butter Beans, Miso Bechamel, Toasted Nuts & Seeds
Super Green Cheats Lasagne With Courgette, Butter Beans, Miso Bechamel, Toasted Nuts & Seeds

steps.raw_text: Preheat your oven to 220°C / 200°C fan
steps.label: Preheat oven
steps.notes: Preheat to 220°C conventional or 200°C fan.

steps.raw_text: Take out a large casserole dish or an oven-proof deep pan, along with a blender
steps.label: Prepare equipment
steps.notes: Gather casserole dish, blender, and mixing bowl.

steps.raw_text: Take out all the ingredients for this recipe and rinse any raw grains, herbs or vegetables
steps.label: Prepare ingredients
steps.notes: Rinse vegetables and gather all ingredients.

steps.raw_text: Place your casserole dish over medium-high heat and drizzle in some olive oil. Slice the courgette into 0.5cm rounds, add to the pan, and sauté
steps.label: Sauté courgettes
steps.notes: Courgettes should be softened and lightly browned.

steps.raw_text: Add the super green lasagne sauce and baby spinach into a blender, and blend until smooth and vibrant green
steps.label: Blend sauce and spinach
steps.notes: Alternatively use stick blender. Blend until smooth.

steps.raw_text: Pour the sauce into the pan along with 50ml of water and the butter beans (including the water). Give everything a good mix and cook until lightly bubbling, around 3 minutes
steps.label: Combine sauce and beans
steps.notes: Double water measurement for four person portion (100ml).

steps.raw_text: Break the lasagne sheets into 3-4 pieces each and add them to the simmering sauce. Stir well and place the dish in the pre-heated oven and bake for 10 minutes
steps.label: Add lasagne and bake
steps.notes: Break sheets and ensure they're evenly distributed.

steps.raw_text: Meanwhile, toast the nuts and seeds by dry frying (without oil) in a small frying pan until golden, around 2-4 minutes
steps.label: Toast nuts and seeds
steps.notes: Dry fry without oil. Almonds, hazelnuts, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds.

steps.raw_text: Remove the lasagne from the oven, pour over the miso bechamel and return it to the oven for another 15-20 minutes or until the bechamel is a little thicker
steps.label: Add bechamel and bake
steps.notes: Bake 15-20 minutes. Bechamel should thicken. Allow to rest 5 minutes before serving.

steps.raw_text: Drizzle or scatter the toasted nuts and seeds over the lasagne, divide between serving bowls and enjoy
steps.label: Garnish and serve
steps.notes: Top with toasted nuts and seeds.
